CustomField.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Transaction_Type_Detail__c ,'New Fleet Sale') ,OR(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Customer_Category_for_Item_Map__c = 'External',SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Customer_Category_for_Item_Map__c = 'Third Party Partnership'))
CustomField.label: New Manufacture - Sale for Item Mapping
